name: Happy Plane (Super Happy Fun Games)
description:
A small game where you fly your plane collecting stars to reach your goal at the finish line.

You have limited controls, pitch up or pitch down... you need to use this to figure out the best route to the goal.

Make sure you try and collect all the stars along the way.

Power-ups can help you reach the highest heights, or recover from impossible crashes.

Known bugs:

* Too many to list... it a work in progress.
